Container.Name: endlessh
Container.Overview: [Endlessh](https://github.com/skeeto/endlessh) Endlessh is an SSH tarpit that very slowly sends an endless, random SSH banner. It keeps SSH clients locked up for hours or even days at a time. The purpose is to put your real SSH server on another port and then let the script kiddies get stuck in this tarpit instead of bothering a real server.

Config.Name: MSDELAY
Config.Description: The endless banner is sent one line at a time. This is the delay in milliseconds between individual lines.

Config.Name: MAXLINES
Config.Description: The length of each line is randomized. This controls the maximum length of each line. Shorter lines may keep clients on for longer if they give up after a certain number of bytes.

Config.Name: MAXCLIENTS
Config.Description: Maximum number of connections to accept at a time. Connections beyond this are not immediately rejected, but will wait in the queue.

Config.Name: LOGFILE
Config.Description: By default, the app logs to container log. If this is set to `true`, the log will be output to file under `/config.logs/endlessh` (`/config` needs to be mapped).
